title: Is this happening to anyone else right now? The patcher is down?
body: i keep getting a message saying my version of league isnt working that it needs to restore to an older version when i does it says the patcher doesnt work and its an endless cycle of restore and restart. i want to know if this is happening to anyone else. also i was literally about to start a ranked match so i hope this doesnt affect my elo.

replies.body: It sounds like you were probably being affected by the strange patcher loop issue that was happening earlier this morning. Let us know in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some of your network logs so that our tech team can take a look at what's going on!
Yes mine is broken too.  I tried to reinstall but that didn't work either.
